Sun.title: Scientists extracted water and oxygen from moon dust using sunlight. Could it work on the lunar surface?
Sun.description: "We never fully imagined the 'magic' that the lunar soil possessed."
Sun.author: Keith Cooper

Sun.title: Don't miss the third quarter moon shine near Saturn in the eastern sky tonight
Sun.description: The left-hand side of the moon will appear lit by direct sunlight, with the right bathed in shadow.
Sun.author: Anthony Wood

Sun.title: Astronomers witness the birth of a planetary system for the 1st time (video)
Sun.description: "For the first time, we have identified the earliest moment when planet formation is initiated around a star other than our sun."
Sun.author: Robert Lea

Mercury.title: February new moon 2025: The young moon occults Mercury and passes by Venus
Mercury.description: On Feb. 28, the one-day-old moon will pass in front of Mercury for observers in Australia and the south Pacific, and on March 1 the moon will make a close pass to Venus.
Mercury.author: Jesse Emspak

Mercury.title: See Mercury at its best in the night sky over the next 2 weeks
Mercury.description: Despite its reputation, Mercury is not really that difficult to spot. But March 2025
Mercury.author: Joe Rao

Mercury.title: Mercury looks stunning in images from BepiColombo spacecraft's 6th and final flyby
Mercury.description: "BepiColombo's main mission phase may only start two years from now, but all six of its flybys of Mercury have given us invaluable new information about the little-explored planet."
Mercury.author: Robert Lea

Venus.title: Venus is at its farthest from the sun on June 1: Here's how to see the bright 'morning star' this weekend
Venus.description: Venus will rise in the eastern sky in the pre-dawn hours of June 1 alongside Saturn and Neptune.
Venus.author: Anthony Wood

Venus.title: Venus, Saturn and the moon dazzle at dawn in 'romantic' photo from Chew Valley Lake (photo)
Venus.description: It was a race against the rising sun as astrophotographer Josh Dury captured a fleeting cosmic moment before dawnâ€™s light washed the scene away.
Venus.author: Daisy Dobrijevic

Venus.title: Curious circles on Venus suggest its surface is still changing
Venus.description: Out of 75 coronae examined, 52 showed signs of these underground forces still at work, hinting that tectonic activity may be more widespread on Venus than previously thought.
Venus.author: Victoria Corless

Earth.title: Lunar lava tubes on Earth? China completes underground moon simulation test area (video)
Earth.description: The practice area will provide proving ground for robotic autonomous exploration.
Earth.author: Andrew Jones

Earth.title: China's Tianwen 2 asteroid-sampling probe snaps gorgeous shots of Earth and the moon (video, photos)
Earth.description: The images sent home from Tianwen 2 show the spacecraft is operating well as it heads out into deep space
Earth.author: Andrew Jones

Earth.title: Bad news for alien life? Earth-size planets may be less common than we thought
Earth.description: "It raises the question: Just how common are Earth-sized planets?"
Earth.author: Robert Lea

Mars.title: Dust devils on Mars leave 'fingerprints' that can guide future Red Planet missions
Mars.description: The high winds that birth dust devils can also revitalize robots by cleaning their solar cells.
Mars.author: Nola Taylor Tillman

Mars.title: The largest Mars meteorite on Earth has sold for $4.3 million
Mars.description: It sold for more than the maximum estimated price of $4 million.
Mars.author: Monisha Ravisetti

Mars.title: If aliens existed on Mars 3.7 billion years ago, they would have needed umbrellas
Mars.description: "Our work is a new piece of evidence that suggests that Mars was once a much more complex and active planet than it is now."
Mars.author: Keith Cooper

Saturn.title: A vast shadow will sweep over Saturn's cloud tops early on July 18: Here's how to see it
Saturn.description: Titan shadow transit seasons occurs just once every 15 years.
Saturn.author: Anthony Wood

Saturn.title: Don't miss the third quarter moon shine near Saturn in the eastern sky tonight
Saturn.description: The left-hand side of the moon will appear lit by direct sunlight, with the right bathed in shadow.
Saturn.author: Anthony Wood

Saturn.title: The precursors of life could form in the lakes of Saturn's moon Titan
Saturn.description: "The existence of any vesicles on Titan would demonstrate an increase in order and complexity, which are conditions necessary for the origin of life."
Saturn.author: Robert Lea

Uranus.title: Scientists find Uranus is surprisingly warm, heating up the case for a new planetary mission
Uranus.description: "I think it strengthens the case for a mission to Uranus."
Uranus.author: Brett Tingley

Uranus.title: Dramatic changes on Uranus, Neptune, Saturn and Jupiter revealed in 10 years of Hubble Telescope images (video)
Uranus.description: The space agency has learned a lot over 10 years observing the weather of our solar system's outer planets.
Uranus.author: Josh Dinner

Uranus.title: 'There are lots of mysteries in our backyard': Revised solar system chemistry explains long-standing puzzles
Uranus.description: "We have been calling Uranus an ice giant, but we don't really know its nature."
Uranus.author: Sharmila Kuthunur
